actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10 damage) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
